description: Retrieves detailed information about the specified recommendation report.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The recommendation report generation task id returned by  StartRecommendationReportGeneration.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the recommendation report generation task. See the response of  StartRecommendationReportGeneration.

nested_items.name: recommendationReportDetails
nested_items.description: Detailed information about the recommendation report.

nested_items.name: completionTime
nested_items.description: The time that the recommendation report generation task completes.

nested_items.name: s3Bucket
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket where the report file is located.

nested_items.name: s3Keys
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 key name of the report file.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The time that the recommendation report generation task starts.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the recommendation report generation task.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: The status message for recommendation report generation.
